name: Tamo Pop
description:
Tammy is stuck in the sewer, use her pop to get it up.

Hold space to charge jump, release to fly, move with WASD or arrow keys. have fun.

I should mention that we did not put in the end criteria as of yet, so the game has no win condition, we will be updating over the next couple of days.

Art by : https://argy-bargy-art.itch.io/

Programming by: https://revolver1399.itch.io/

Special Thanks to https://www.twitch.tv/dandydidit for all your testing.

**Fix Update

Added acceleration to run

Changed ground ray cast to a boxcast

Added some more insanity

Volume Settings added

Removed duplicate audiosources from scenes.
